result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.ga: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.orig: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.html: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: At your age...
result.ga: San aois a bhfuil tú ann
result.orig: San aois a bhfuil tú ann
result.html: San aois a bhfuil tú annAt your age...
result.ponchtml: San aois a ḃfuil tú annAt your age...

result.eng: This must be the end of the world.
result.ga: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.orig: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil ann
result.html: Caithfidh sé go bhfuil deireadh an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ sé go ḃfuil deireaḋ an tsaoil annThis must be the end of the world.

result.eng: It's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ga: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibh
result.orig: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibh
result.html: Tá an meán oíche ann Slán codlata agaibhIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ponchtml: Tá an meán oíċe ann Slán codlata agaiḃIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.

result.eng: Wasn't he man enough?
result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.orig: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann
result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
result.ponchtml: Naċ raiḃ go leor den ḟear annWasn't he man enough?
